task.summary: Default task
feat: user can rate purchased courses.
feat: user can rate author of purchased couses.
refactor: update commands exceptions.
feat: add internationalization option.
feat: add russian locale representation to pages.
fix: charset problem when adding russian symbols to base from interface.
feat: add internationalization to custom tags.
feat: log out is now correct.
feat: add jsp direct access filter.
feat: add url role access filter.
feat: add error page.
feat: add password encrypting.
refactor: redirect links are relative now.
feat: add form validation on server side while registering new account.
fix: problem when new user was able to rewrite default avatar while changing photo.
fix: problem with displaying updated photos. Photos now are stored outside of app and their displaying handled with separated servlet.
style: add max-height to images on ui pages.
refactor: add operation message to approve account avatar option.
fix: problem with changing course image when course have current image as default picture.
fix: ability to re-purchase the course when use "back" browser option.
refactor: update change avatar and change course image options urls and messages.
feat: add server form validation for deposit and cash-out options.
style: update styles.
feat: full server side validation.
refactor: recommended courses are now random courses which still not purchased by user.
feat: add restore forgotten password logic, including sending email with link to restore page, security check.
style: change login, restore password, change forgotten password pages.
refactor: url access filter controls access to course learning page depending of is course available to particular account.
feat: add tests for MarkService methods.
feat: add tests for PaymentService methods.
feat: add tests for CourseService methods.
feat: add tests for all services, repositories and specifications.
refactor: logging improved.
refactor: move global constants to separated class.
style: improve displaying of main page and course options links (from custom tag).
feat: recommended courses are now random, generates from the beginning every time someone visiting main page.
feat: add to admin delete course comments function.
feat: add to admin delete comments about author function.
refactor: add f5 protect.
refactor: improve exception handling.
style: improve exception pages style.
feat: user now can edit or delete his course-mark comment.
feat: user now can edit or delete his author-mark comment.
refactor: add error messages with localisation.
refactor: course purchase transactions safety.
refactor: improve error logging.
refactor: improve error logging.
refactor: add f5 protection to admin actions.
fix: user purchase not approved course when use direct link on course page.
